aboutMe: Innovative Frontend developer with 5 years experience building and maintaining responsive websites in the recruiting industry. Proficient in HTML, CSS, jQuery, JavaScript and Angualr; plus modern libraries and frameworks. Passionate about usability and possess working knowledge of Adobe Photoshop & Sketch.

experiences.description:
TEKsystems is a leading IT staffing, IT talent management and IT services firm.

My core activities include:
• Building stable and maintainable codebases using React.
 • Recommending solutions for a streamlined, user-friendly interface.
 • Performing bug fixes and code reviews. Technical debt reduced by 32%.
• Creating modular, responsive templates using modern CSS and JS libraries.
• Ensuring proper documentation and reports in all stages of product life cycles.
• Conducting A/B testing to identify bugs and UI improvements.

technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JS, React, Redux, Angular, JQuery, Adobe Photoshop, Sketch
